current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
Providing for the appointment of Michael Lynton as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the
			 Smithsonian Institution.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following joint resolution; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, in the class other than
			 Members of Congress, occurring by reason of the resignation of France A.
			 Córdova of Indiana on March 13, 2014, is filled by the
			 appointment of Michael Lynton of California.  The appointment is for a
			 term of 6
			 years, beginning on the date of enactment of this joint
			 resolution.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 SJ 40 IS: Providing for the appointment of Michael Lynton as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.
